feature.label: System Analyzer (UIA Target) (Target Content)
feature.description: This version of System Analyzer (UIA Target) Target Content can be chosen separately for each C/C++ project via their project settings. The System Analyzer (UIA Target) IDE Client, on the other hand, is common to all projects and its version must be equal to or greater than the version of this Target Content feature.
feature.license: Released under Texas Instruments Incorporated - Technology Software Publicly Available license.
